items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Tea Party Dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I wish I could give more stars. I love this dress! I had a tea party themed party and this dress was right spot on! It was comfortable and stretchy. It was a little big- I should have sized down and got my size but I thought to go up and it still executed the look. Get your regular size when you get this dress but make sure you GET THIS DRESS! Read more
items.author: Lola

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect tweed dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Amazing dress! Looks fancy and cute for spring/summer. Material is nice but can pull easily if you’re not careful which is why I took a star off. It fits perfect. I’m 5’4” and 127lbs and I purchased a small. Love it!! Read more
items.author: Regina M. Zobel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised at how nice this is. Buy it!!!
items.body: I get the package and see that it's from Shein. I am immediately disappointed and think we'll this is going back. HOWEVER, I open it, try it on, and stand in front of the mirror in disbelief! It looks STUNNING! The fit is perfection, the draped of the material is beautiful, and the material and color are fascinating. I stand there saying WOW! I CANT BELIEF THIS! The material does have a bit of stretch and it may not be material of Chanel quality but it is pretty classy and REALLY nice. I'm just ordered the pink and maybe later the white. I ordered a small and I'm 5'3 and yo-yo between 135 and 142. I will try to update with a photo. But just buy it! Read more
items.author: julie rubin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: Pretty dress but way too short. Although I’m tall, 5’10”. Read more
items.author: Hannah P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made beautiful work/play dress
items.body: I’m 5’2” 179 lbs XL, I bought this dress on a whim thinking that I was not going to really like it but oh I was wrong, it fit perfectly in all the right places! The material looks more expensive than I originally thought it would look like when it arrived.. once again I was wrong, it’s really nice. I will say I don’t really like the buttons where they are placed, but that’s an easy fix. I can move them somewhere else. I was really glad to find that I’m 5 foot two and it even actually came right to my knees, because I am only 5 foot two I don’t really like to wear dresses past my knee. I like them above my knee and this worked out perfectly. I do plan to buy more of these dresses in different colors. I’m gonna give it 4 1/2 stars only because of where the buttons are at otherwise I would’ve given it five stars! Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy but go by product measurements for best size
items.body: This is a really nice quality fabric and silhouette! I bought the light blue one in a size large even though my Amazon account said a medium would fit me. But when I looked at the specific product measurements I realized I better size up and I’m glad I did. I am 5’4” and weigh 145-150. Good value for the money and very comfortable against the skin. Slight stretch in the fabric and a good weight for high quality materials. Read more
items.author: ron glenn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the $
items.body: Looks very cheap, there's no structure on the dress. Read more
items.author: Joce

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Cute but runs small Read more
items.author: Tammy Miller

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lilac Purple, Pink, White, Orange Multi, Soft Pink, Burgundy, Blue and White, Mint Blue, Black and White, Black, Ginger. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
